info.infotext: This is one of our first pictures together (probably ever). I think it was takes at stage 51. Its the beginning of something really beautiful.

X Factor. At the time i was kinda apprehensive about it. But at the same time back then and even know i was soo so proud of you for doing this. You have the strength to do things i could never even attempt.
Simona took this picture. I remember it as a fun time even though i am not completely sure what we were doing. We look great though :3.
SANTA! This is the first time i met this guy i remember him being super cool. He gave me some compliments too.

50 shades. Do i even need to go into detail why we went to see the movie. I remember us both being into the books. Also those books in many ways influenced parts of our relationship (mr bean with eyebrows gif)
Our first “Аз мога” together. We were such small kids back then. I remember the cake and burning the couch in the lil house.
I AM IN THIS PICTURE. I came to support you even though i remember being scared to death of all the unknowns. You were wonderful and i found out i like concerts.
Wait?? What do you mean thats not a picture of you and me??
This is one of the many random pictures we have together. I dont remember the exact day and i dont remember what we did. But we are super cute.
Your first birthday where we were together. It was the perfect birthday. Ate good pizza, laughed and drank (good?) beer later.
